author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA TONIGHT INTO EARLY THURSDAY...
summary: ...IMELDA EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA TONIGHT INTO EARLY THURSDAY... As of 2:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 01 the center of Imelda was located near 31.2, -69.2 with movement ENE at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 966 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
